OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.description: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interests.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI on Derivatives, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income of accumulated gain (loss) realized from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount before tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherIncreaseDecreaseInEnvironmentalLiab.label: Other Increase (Decrease) in Environmental Liabilities
OtherIncreaseDecreaseInEnvironmentalLiab.description: Other increase (decrease) not attributable to current expense nor cash payments during an accounting period in estimated obligations recorded for probable future costs attributable to environmental contamination issues.

OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Noncurrent
OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.label: Other Operating Activities, Cash Flow Statement
OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.description: Other cash or noncash adjustments to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operating activities that are not separately disclosed in the statement of cash flows (for example, cash received or cash paid during the current period for miscellaneous operating activities, net change during the reporting period in other assets or other liabilities).

OtherSignificantNoncashTransactionValueO.label: Other Significant Noncash Transaction, Value of Consideration Given
OtherSignificantNoncashTransactionValueO.description: "The value of the noncash (or part noncash) consideration given (for example, liability, equity) in a transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of a transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Distributions
PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.description: Total distributions to each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units
PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.description: The number of each class of partnership units outstanding at the balance sheet date. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalIncludingPortionAttributa.label: Partners' Capital, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
PartnersCapitalIncludingPortionAttributa.description: Amount of partners' capital (deficit), including portions attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.label: Payments of Capital Distribution
PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Debt Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt.

PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.label: Payments of Distributions to Affiliates
PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.description: The distributions of earnings to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Noncontrolling Interest
PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Gross
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.label: Payments to Noncontrolling Interests
PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash outflow to a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but not limited to, reduction of noncontrolling interest ownership. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAc.label: Premium Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAc.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on premium receivable.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets, Current
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.label: Prior Period Reclassification Adjustment
PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.description: The amount of a reclassification adjustment made to prior period financial statement amounts.

ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution, Return of Capital
ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return of investment, classified as investing activities. Excludes distribution for return on investment, classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromIssuanceInitialPublicOfferin.label: Proceeds from Issuance Initial Public Offering
ProceedsFromIssuanceInitialPublicOfferin.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's first offering of stock to the public.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Limited Partners Units
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common limited partners units during the period.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSeniorLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Senior Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSeniorLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer).

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.label: Proceeds from Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash inflow from a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, purchase of additional shares or other increase in noncontrolling interest ownership.

ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution.label: Proceeds from Partnership Contribution
ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution.description: The cash inflow from the capital received in cash from a partner in a partnership during the period.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: The net cash inflow or cash outflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfReceivabl.label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Receivables
ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfReceivabl.description: The cash inflow associated with the proceeds from sale and collection of receivables during the period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

ProceedsFromSalesOfAssetsInvestingActivi.label: Proceeds from Sales of Assets, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromSalesOfAssetsInvestingActivi.description: Aggregate cash proceeds received from a combination of transactions that are classified as investing activities in which assets, which may include one or more investments, are sold to third-party buyers. This element can be used by entities to aggregate proceeds from all asset sales that are classified as investing activities.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Additions
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.description: Amount of acquisition of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGrossPeriodIncr.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross, Period Increase (Decrease)
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGrossPeriodIncr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PublicUtilitiesApprovedDebtCapitalStruct.label: Public Utilities, Approved Debt Capital Structure, Percentage
PublicUtilitiesApprovedDebtCapitalStruct.description: Percentage of public utility's approved debt to capital, including debt and equity.

PublicUtilitiesApprovedEquityCapitalStru.label: Public Utilities, Approved Equity Capital Structure, Percentage
PublicUtilitiesApprovedEquityCapitalStru.description: Percentage of public utility's approved equity to capital, including debt and equity.

PurchaseObligation.label: Purchase Obligation
PurchaseObligation.description: Minimum amount of purchase arrangement in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services from a supplier.

PurchaseObligationDueAfterFifthYear.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, after Year Five
PurchaseObligationDueAfterFifthYear.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationDueInFifthYear.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Five
PurchaseObligationDueInFifthYear.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationDueInFourthYear.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Four
PurchaseObligationDueInFourthYear.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationDueInNextTwelveMonths.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year One
PurchaseObligationDueInNextTwelveMonths.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationDueInSecondYear.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Two
PurchaseObligationDueInSecondYear.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationDueInThirdYear.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Three
PurchaseObligationDueInThirdYear.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

QualitativeAndQuantitativeInformationAss.label: Qualitative and Quantitative Information, Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Principal Amount Outstanding (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
QualitativeAndQuantitativeInformationAss.description: The total principal outstanding of financial assets transferred in a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer that has been accounted for as sales and in which the transferor continues to have involvement, including both the derecognized and recognized portion of such transferred assets.

QuantifyingMisstatementInCurrentYearFina.label: Quantifying Misstatement in Current Year Financial Statements, Amount
QuantifyingMisstatementInCurrentYearFina.description: Amount of each individual error being corrected in the correcting adjustment.

QuarterlyFinancialInformationQuarterlyCh.label: Quarterly Financial Information, Quarterly Charges and Credits, Amount Reconciling to Previously Reported Results (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
QuarterlyFinancialInformationQuarterlyCh.description: Amount by which previously reported quarterly results were revised (for example, to correct an error, or to give retrospective effect to a change in an accounting principle).

ReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Receivables, Net, Current
ReceivablesNetCurrent.description: The total amount due to the entity within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from outside sources, including trade accounts receivable, notes and loans receivable, as well as any other types of receivables, net of allowances established for the purpose of reducing such receivables to an amount that approximates their net realizable value.

RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.label: Related Party Transaction, Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.description: Expenses recognized resulting from transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RevenueFromRelatedParties.label: Revenue from Related Parties
RevenueFromRelatedParties.description: Amount of revenue, fees and commissions earned from transactions between (a) a parent company and its subsidiaries; (b) subsidiaries of a common parent; (c) an entity and trusts for the benefit of employees, for example, but not limited to, pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; (d) an entity and its principal, owners, management, or members of their immediate families; and (e) affiliates.

RevenueOilAndGasServices.label: Revenue, Oil and Gas Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
RevenueOilAndGasServices.description: Revenue from oil and gas-related services including well services (such as drilling, rigs and analytic evaluations), transportation, and other supporting contractor services, during the reporting period.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Shares Authorized
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

SubsidiaryOfLimitedLiabilityCompanyOrLim.label: Subsidiary of Limited Liability Company or Limited Partnership, Ownership Interest
SubsidiaryOfLimitedLiabilityCompanyOrLim.description: The number of units or percentage investment held in the subsidiary by the limited liability company or limited partnership.

TangibleAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Tangible Asset Impairment Charges
TangibleAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the aggregate write down of tangible assets from their carrying value to their fair value.

UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.label: Unamortized Debt Issuance Expense
UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.description: The remaining balance of debt issuance expenses that were capitalized and are being amortized against income over the lives of the respective bond issues. This does not include the amounts capitalized as part of the cost of the utility plant or asset.

UnbilledContractsReceivable.label: Unbilled Contracts Receivable
UnbilledContractsReceivable.description: Unbilled amounts due for services rendered or to be rendered, actions taken or to be taken, or a promise to refrain from taking certain actions in accordance with the terms of a legally binding agreement between the entity and, at a minimum, one other party. An example would be amounts associated with contracts or programs where the recognized revenue for performance thereunder exceeds the amounts billed under the terms thereof as of the date of the balance sheet.

UnrealizedGainLossOnCashFlowHedgingInstr.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Cash Flow Hedging Instruments
UnrealizedGainLossOnCashFlowHedgingInstr.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) related to derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments, recorded in results of operations to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be ineffective.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Purchases
UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.description: The amount purchased during the period under an unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation (for example, under the take-or-pay or throughput contract).

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Used in the calculation of diluted net income or loss per limited partnership unit.

WeightedAverageNumberOfLimitedPartnershi.label: Weighted Average Number of Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfLimitedPartnershi.description: The average number of limited partnership and general partnership units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per limited partnership and general partnership unit.
